Text.text: All panels on this page use css class 'sapUiResponsiveMargin' to clear space all around, depending on the available width.
Please resize the the browser window and/or use the 'Full Screen' button to see how the margins change.
Since panels have a default width of 100%, horizontal margins are not displayed appropriately.
Therefore we need to set each panel's 'width' property to 'auto'.
